articles.title: Israeli attacks on Gaza killed nearly 100 Palestinians on Monday
articles.description: Israeli warplanes bombed a seaside cafe in northern Gaza City, killing at least 39 people, including children. Photojournalist Ismail Abu Hatab was among the dead. Separately, Israel attacked tents housing displaced people at Al-Aqsa Hospital. Gaza's hunger crisis deepens, with the UN warning of a complete lack of infant formula and at least 66 children already dead from malnutrition.

articles.title: Trump to Attend Opening of "Alligator Alcatraz" ICE Jail in Florida
articles.description: President Trump is set to attend the opening of a new immigration detention facility in the Florida Everglades, dubbed "Alligator Alcatraz." The facility, a mass detention tent camp, is expected to hold up to 5,000 people awaiting deportation and will cost an estimated $450 million annually to operate.

articles.title: Six workers killed in fire accident at fireworks unit near Sivakasi
articles.description: A fire at the Gokhales Fireworks unit in Chinnakamanpatti village, near Sivakasi, has resulted in the deaths of six workers and injured five others, with three in critical condition. The injured have been admitted to the Government Hospital in Sivakasi.
